zip_payment_group.label: Zip Payment - Own it now, pay later

zip_payment.label: Zip Payment Solution
zip_payment.comment:
Zip Payment gives your customers the power to pay later, interest free   learn more
Don't have an account? Click here to apply for a Zip Business Account

health_check.label: Health Check
health_check.comment: Before Health check please save all zip configuration details.

active.label: Enable this Solution
active.tooltip: Set to 'Yes' to enable Zip Payment as a secure payment method on your website

environment.label: Environment
environment.tooltip: Only use "Production" in conjunction with production Zip partner credentials, and only use ‘Sandbox’ in conjunction with sandbox Zip partner credentials

credential_button.comment: Switch keys by changing the above Environment field

private_key.label: Private Key
private_key.tooltip: Enter the "Zip Partner Private Key". This can be located in your Zip partner dashboard. Note: these are different for "Production" and "Sandbox" environments.

public_key.label: Public Key
public_key.tooltip: Enter the "Zip Partner Public Key". This can be located in your Zip partner dashboard. Note: these are different for "Production" and "Sandbox" environments.

title.label: Title
title.tooltip: This payment method title is used to display as payment method option
title.comment: It is recommended to set this value to "Zip - Own it now, pay later"

payment_action.label: Payment Action
payment_action.tooltip: Capture Mode to handle Zip Payment
payment_action.comment: Please select Immediate Capture for non AUD currency.

order_status.label: New Order Status
order_status.tooltip: Define the order status after payment been processed

min_order_total.label: Minimum Order Total
min_order_total.tooltip: The minimum order value amount required to checkout

max_order_total.label: Maximum Order Total
max_order_total.tooltip: The maximum order value amount required to checkout

sort_order.label: Sort Order
sort_order.tooltip: Give a number to define the position in payment option Zip Payment will be placed, 0 is the first position

checkout_type.label: Checkout Type
checkout_type.tooltip: Select checkout type. one page checkout or one step checkout
checkout_type.comment: This setting is used to identify which type of checkout has been used

checkout_path.label: Path of Checkout Page
checkout_path.tooltip: Please enter a path to identify checkout page, not includes last slash

display_mode.label: Display Mode
display_mode.tooltip: Select display mode for Zip Checkout, popup or redirect
display_mode.comment: This setting is used to identify how can we handle checkout authentication and confirmation from Zip

click_collect.label: Click and Collect Method Code
click_collect.comment: Enter a code/word to help Zip recognise the 'Click and Collect' shipping method.
click_collect.tooltip: We'll use regex expression to match all shipping methods includes this method code. pickup means '*pickup*' that will matched "auspost_pickup" or "pickup_****" or "pickup****". Empty field means Zip Payment will not detect Click and Collect shipping method.

order_creation.label: Order Handling
order_creation.tooltip: Zip Money refer application default order handling
order_creation.comment: Required for Zip Money product only. The default value is “Yes”, create order for referred application

order_status.label: New Order Status
order_status.tooltip: Define the order status when a referred order be placed

log_level.label: Log Level
log_level.tooltip: Select 'All' to log everything, 'Default' to log payment information and 'None' to disabled logging

enabled.label: Enabled
enabled.tooltip: Set to 'Yes' to fetch Zip notifications

zip_payment_widgets.label: Widgets and Banners
zip_payment_widgets.comment: Display Zip Payment marketing banner and popup on home page to give customers more information and increase conversions
